Title: Limits a candidate to one authorized committee per election; defines "multi-candidate committee"; provides that such a committee may not be an authorized committee
Summary: Limits a candidate for public office to one authorized committee per election; defines the term "multi-candidate committee" and provides that such a committee may not be authorized by a candidate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to limiting a candidate to one authorized committee per election, per office
